name: Calvary Baptist Child Care
description: Calvary Baptist Child Care is a child care service operated by Calvary Baptist Church in London, Kentucky. The facility provides child care services for families in the London area, offering a safe and nurturing environment for children. The child care program is part of the church's ministry and serves the local community with quality child care services.
source: Verified from multiple official sources including Google Business listing, Kentucky Baptist Convention, and Laurel County Electronic Resource Guide
notes: Child care service operated by Calvary Baptist Church. The church has a 5.0-star rating from 7 Google reviews and serves the London, Kentucky community. The child care program is part of the church's ministry services.
